authors: Eugene F. Fama and James D. MacBeth
title: Risk Return and Equilibrium: Empirical Tests
Investors' Expectations of Earnings Growth, Their Accuracy and Effects on the Structure of Realized Rates of Return
variables:
Price Earnings Ratio : Risk and Earnings Growth Expectation. 
Risk measured by beta coefficient, dividend payout ratio, firm asset size (natural log of total asset), leverage, earnings variability

title: Investment performance of common stocks in relation to their price-earnings ratios: a test of the efficient market hypothesis
variables:
Price Earnings Ratio:
Numerator - market prices times the number of shares outstanding
Denominator - Annual Earnings

authors: Litzenberger, Robert H and Ramaswamy, Krishna
title: The effect of personal taxes and dividends on capital asset prices: Theory and empirical evidence
